text: وَلَئِنۡ أَصَٰبَكُمۡ فَضۡلٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لَيَقُولَنَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ تَكُنۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُۥ مَوَدَّةٞ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ مَعَهُمۡ فَأَفُوزَ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمٗا

translation.en: But if bounty comes to you from Allah, he will surely say, as if there had never been between you and him any affection. "Oh, I wish I had been with them so I could have attained a great attainment
translation.id: Dan sungguh, jika kamu mendapat karunia (kemenangan) dari Allah, tentulah dia mengatakan seakan-akan belum pernah ada hubungan kasih sayang antara kamu dengan dia, "Wahai, sekiranya aku bersama mereka, tentu aku akan memperoleh kemenangan yang agung (pula)
